definition: Mt Tai 泰山[Tai4 Shan1] in Shandong/abbr. for Thailand
the country prospers, the people at peace (idiom); peace and prosperity

sentences.english: We sincerely hope that Thailand enjoys social harmony, economic development as well as prosperity and peace.
sentences.chinese: 衷心祝願泰國社會和諧，經濟發展，國泰民安。

sentences.english: We all wish for the country to be prosperous and the people AT peace.
sentences.chinese: 我們都希望我們的國家國泰民安。

sentences.english: A foray into the LCC segment is now not likely for Cathay Pacific.
sentences.chinese: 對國泰航空而言，目前進入低成本航空業是不可能的。

sentences.english: Hong Kong to Rome round trip economy class air ticket on Cathay Pacific.
sentences.chinese: 國泰航空由香港至羅馬來回經濟客位機票。

sentences.english: Booking office of Cathay Pacific. May I help you?
sentences.chinese: 國泰航空公司售票處，有什麼可以爲你效勞嗎？

sentences.english: Roundtrip Economy class air ticket for Hong Kong and Ho Chi Minh City on CX.
sentences.chinese: 國泰航空公司來回香港至胡志明市機票。

sentences.english: Roundtrip Economy class air ticket for Hong Kong and Amsterdam on CX.
sentences.chinese: 國泰航空公司來回香港至阿姆斯特丹機票。

sentences.english: Cathay Pacific has enjoyed a solid safety record in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 國泰航空公司近年來一直有着可靠的安全紀錄。

sentences.english: Roundtrip Economy class air ticket for Hong Kong and Prague on CX.
sentences.chinese: 國泰航空公司來回香港至布拉格機票。

sentences.english: Roundtrip Economy class air ticket for Hong Kong and Sapporo on CX.
sentences.chinese: 國泰航空公司來回香港至札幌機票。

sentences.english: Roundtrip Economy class air ticket for Hong Kong and Frankfurt on CX.
sentences.chinese: 來回國泰航空公司經濟客位機票。

sentences.english: Roundtrip Economy class air ticket for Hong Kong and Brisbane on CX.
sentences.chinese: 國泰航空公司來回香港至布里斯本機票。

sentences.english: Roundtrip Economy class air ticket for Hong Kong and Colombo on CX.
sentences.chinese: 國泰航空公司來回香港至可倫坡機票。

sentences.english: Roundtrip Economy class air ticket for Hong Kong and Beijing on CX.
sentences.chinese: 國泰航空公司來回香港至北京機票。

sentences.english: Roundtrip Economy class air ticket for Hong Kong and Shanghai on CX.
sentences.chinese: 國泰航空公司來回香港至上海機票。

sentences.english: It will be focusing on preserving cash levels until the crisis abates.
sentences.chinese: 國泰航空將集中精力保持現金水平直至危機解除。

definition: China Airlines (Taiwan)/abbr. for 中華航空公司|中华航空公司[Zhong1 hua2 Hang2 kong1 Gong1 si1]
Hong Kong and Shanghai Banking Corporation (HSBC)
Asian area/the Far East/Asia Pacific region
to cut prices/to discount/to mark down/price cutting
running/operation (of airport, bus service, business etc)
to inject funds/to put money into (the market)
